extendedInfo.description: An official App from Disney! Featuring Walt Disney WorldÂ® maps, official Disney Parks-provided wait times, FASTPASSÂ® return times, and the ability to view menus and book dining reservations, manage and share itineraries with family and friends, find details about nearby Disney Characters, attractions, entertainment, park hours and schedules, and more! â¢NEW! Global Navigation makes it easier to find Things to Do, plan your vacation, manage your account and view Help & Support. Includes quick links to Wait Times, Disney Character appearances, Here & Now and more!â¢NEW! Scan your tickets and passes with your phone or tablet to link them to My Disney ExperienceINTERACTIVE MAPSâ¢Maps of Walt Disney WorldÂ® Resort, optimized for touch screens, with details only Disney Parks can provide. Pan and zoom around:âTheme Parks: Magic KingdomÂ® Park, EpcotÂ®, Disneyâs Hollywood StudiosÂ® and Disneyâs Animal KingdomÂ® ParkâWater Parks: Disneyâs Typhoon Lagoon and Disneyâs Blizzard BeachâDowntown DisneyÂ® AreaâSelect Walt Disney World Resort hotelsâESPN Wide World of Sports Complexâ¢Sign in to see attraction wait times and dining availability integrated with mapsâ¢Get acquainted with park and hotel locations while planning your visitâ¢Use the new Here & Now feature to instantly find attractions and events closest to your current locationOFFICIAL WALT DISNEY WORLDÂ® PARK INFORMATIONâ¢Explore Walt Disney WorldÂ® attractions, including descriptions, images and height requirementsâ¢Sign in to access special features including official Disney Parks wait times and current FASTPASSÂ® return timesâ¢Locate nearest restrooms, baby care centers, concierge and other Guest Servicesâ¢Learn when and where your favorite Disney Characters will be appearing nextâ¢See Park hours and schedules, available at a glanceâ¢Use Times Guide for a simple look at key events and activities going on within the parkâ¢Browse entertainment, including parades, fireworks, stage shows and performance timesâ¢Find valuable tips and FAQ in Help CenterOFFICIAL DISNEY DINING INFORMATIONâ¢View menus for dining locationsâ¢Browse dining options including Table Service and Quick Service locationsâ¢Check availability and sign in to make dining reservationsâ¢Sort and filter dining options to find what meets the needs of your family based on location, price range, cuisine, and experience descriptionPERSONALIZED EXPERIENCEâ¢View your upcoming resort reservationsâ¢Create and manage your own personalized itinerary, including dining reservations. Add personal notes, reminders for parades, fireworks, and other Disney entertainment. Coming soon: View Resort reservations.â¢Share your itinerary with family and friendsâ¢Save your favorite experiences on Wish Lists, so you wonât forget any must-see itemsâ¢Sign in to manage your personal profileThis app collects your location to enable certain features, such as Maps and Explore. If you choose to not to allow location to be collected, those features will not be available to you. This app also asks you to register by providing certain information about yourself, such as your full name, email and postal address, birthdate and answers to security questions. Registration is optional, but if you choose not to register, certain features may not be available to you. You may also elect to provide other information to take advantage of vacation planning features this app provides, such as details regarding your vacation to Walt Disney World Resort and a credit card number for online purchases.Itâs newâoptimized for mobile devicesâand continuously updated! The official My Disney Experience â Walt Disney WorldÂ® is the very best way to plan your visit, navigate the parks and maximize the magic while enjoying all that Walt Disney WorldÂ® Resort has to offer!Terms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.title: Better than before, at least
reviews.comment: Okay, they fixed the login problem I was having, so I have upgraded the app from 1 to 3 stars just for that. Next time I go to a park I\'ll give it a real test.
reviews.author: Jeff Johnson

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: Installs but won\'t start in my Galaxy S3. Just get a black screen.
reviews.author: Thomas Patrone

reviews.title: Not worth the time.
reviews.comment: Very slow especially since last update. I think it\'s because I\'m on Android. Very disappointing.
reviews.author: kim osburn

reviews.title: App was slow and unresponsive
reviews.comment: I wasn\'t able to use this app for anything. Everything Disney seems to aimed at iPhones and anything Apple.
reviews.author: Carolyn Barnes

reviews.title: Will not open
reviews.comment: I can not get it to open at all. Just a black screen then back to home. Galaxy S3
reviews.author: Michael O\'Mara

reviews.title: Cannot agree to terms & conditions
reviews.comment: There is no button showing to agree or disagree to the terms of using this app. The back and done buttons cover bottom of screen. Can\'t go forward. SAMSING GALAXY S 3. Jellybean 4.1 Please fix. I would love to use this app.
reviews.author: MaryJo Belongia

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: We are in WDW now and I\'ve tried using it for over 5 days with little luck. It\'s incredibly slow whether I\'m on Sprint, AT&T or the parks Wi-Fi. the potential is there but they didn\'t put forth the effort and left a lot of info out.  Menus for lots of restaurants are missing and the app comes up with an error insured of saying it doesn\'t have the info.  Everyone I\'ve seen using the app I\'ve asked what they thought and all are not liking it either. Use the disney parks app insted.
reviews.author: Matthew Filip

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: Constant connection error. Hasn\'t been able to connect for 2 days and when it does it\'s painfully slow
reviews.author: John Brennan

reviews.title: Poor app design
reviews.comment: (1) extremely slow no matter if I\'m using WiFi or LTE.  (2) Upcoming events should have a monthly or weekly view by default. Tapping (and waiting to load) on individual days is a pain.
reviews.author: Bret Pritchett

reviews.title: Useful but not great
reviews.comment: Like Disney\'s website, it sucks up a lot of data and wears out the battery. However, it was useful in  deciding wich rides to do next, and gave the same times as we found at the ride lines. Overall decent, and will probably try again next time we go.
reviews.author: Rose West

reviews.title: Nice attempt but its too slow
reviews.comment: Recently tried this at Disney World 2 days ago. App took forever to load. Thought it might be because of Disney\'s WiFi so turned off WiFi and used my own connection. Still didn\'t help. Turned it off and used a map the rest of the trip. Sorry Disney we had fun but this app didn\'t work well for us
reviews.author: Joshua Roberts

reviews.title: Userless-friendly
reviews.comment: This app is great when it works and necessary for fastpass+ users but the service is buggy and extremely slow when it does work. This is not the seamless Disney experience that is world renowned and the only frustrating part off an otherwise faultless vacation.
reviews.author: Paul Custer

reviews.title: Where have you been all my life!
reviews.comment: This makes the entire Disney experience so much easier for the entire family!
reviews.author: Shawn Keller

reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad
reviews.comment: Google Maps and Waze put me in tge center of Magic Kingdom, MM+ says I must be on property for Here & Now to work.  Then, when MM+ catches up, map never loads.  Also, Disney sold their soul to AT&T and Apple.  In park WiFi is terrible and spotty.  What did you spend that $1B on?
reviews.author: Brendan Marks

reviews.title: Agreement
reviews.comment: Unable to accept the terms and agreement to create an account.  Fix
reviews.author: Chris Showalter

reviews.title: Dont waste your time.
reviews.comment: Unlabeled map so you have to refer to the paper map anyways! Very slow.
reviews.author: Jeff Matt

reviews.title: Scroll feature too sensitive
reviews.comment: Its a nice looking app. But when you\'re trying to make a fastpass selection as you scroll it will pick the one that it THINK you touched and give you a synopsis of it. So you have to use your back button to go back to the list and it does it again. Very annoying. Its not helpful when you\'re trying to make a fastpass selection. I imagine when we actually get to the park,  the maps and list of things that we planned already will be helpful. But you\'re better off doing Fast Pass stuff probably on your compute
reviews.author: Mia Hess

reviews.title: Useful for Fastpass+
reviews.comment: Found it useful for fastpass+ but I wouldn\'t use it for anything else. Used it on an old HTC Incredible S and thought it was the phone was slow. Now tried on an HTC One M7 and still slow. Found a bit faster on data rather than Disney Wifi. App. Also very frustrating trying to get back to the main menu. You essentially just have to back out using the back button through all previous steps... Android App needs some desperate need some further development to increase speed. (iPhone app is faster on an iPhone 4
reviews.author: Jeremy Warnock

reviews.title: .....loading.......
reviews.comment: Like all Disney internet products this app too stinks. Please for the love of goofy just outsource this to a competent developer. I\'m sick of seeing my phone say ...loading.... Learn what a cache is. Look up prefetch. Do something. This is STILL horrible.
reviews.author: J. Meoff

reviews.title: Dreadful
reviews.comment: Such a bad app with terrible performance. Even the progress indicator spins the wrong way. Don\'t get me wrong, Disney is awesome, but this app is embarrassing as the first experience before going to the park.
reviews.author: Nuno Carreira
